verses.verse: I was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>me,<s%> "Let's go to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house!<s%>"
<S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that is <S%H1129>built<s%> as a <S%H5892>city<s%> that is <S%H2266>compact<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%>

<S%H8033>where<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> go <S%H5927>up,<s%> even <S%H3050>Yah<s%>'s <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> according to an <S%H5715>ordinance<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
For there are <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H3678>thrones<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> the <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>
<S%H7592>Pray<s%> for the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> Those who <S%H157>love<s%> you will <S%H7951>prosper.<s%>
<S%H7965>Peace<s%> be within your <S%H2426>walls,<s%> and <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> within your <S%H759>palaces.<s%>
For my <S%H251>brothers<s%>' and <S%H7453>companions<s%>' <S%H1696>sakes,<s%> I will now say, "Peace be within <S%H7965>you.<s%>"
For the sake of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H2896>good.<s%>
